name: 我的三国-单机策略养成手游
name_original: 我的三国-单机策略养成手游
description:
"My Three Kingdoms" is the most popular RPG game in this year.

Who is in charge of this turbulent time? Why not incarnate as the Lord, lead the world's famous generals and chase the Central Plains to show their heroism; after five passes, cut six generals, attack cities and plunder land, build the world's hegemony, unify the mountains and rivers until the ages. Laugh and talk, the king will come to the world, the Three Kingdoms will be named after you!

Game features:
[place the battle, relax]
Super fighting effect, automatic fighting, with a flick of fingers, the spar and scull will be destroyed!

[the scene is magnificent and the painting is exquisite]
Can't you have both fish and bear's paw? No, 100 generals, no krypton, all free. Sitting on the Diao Chan Lu Bu, all three famous generals are for me!

[attack cities and plunder land, fight for hegemony in troubled times]
Restore the battlefield of the Three Kingdoms, with many maps and hundreds of cities waiting for you to fight! United vertical and horizontal, king in the world, the achievement of the Three Kingdoms!

[multi line cultivation, the strongest Corps]
Generals, equipment and secret weapons are all free to cultivate. A variety of cultivation systems help you build the strongest army!

[classic battle, original plot]
The perfect depiction of the classic battles of the Three Kingdoms, together with the shocking background music, the most real legend of the Three Kingdoms is here!

《我的三国》是本年度最火爆的穿越类三国题材单机RPG游戏。
当此乱世，谁主沉浮？何不化身主公，率天下名将，逐鹿中原尽显英雄本色；过五关斩六将，攻城掠地，建传世霸业，一统山河直至千秋万代。笑谈间，君临天下，三国志以你为名！

游戏特色：
【放置战斗，休闲轻松】
超强战斗效果，自动战斗，弹指一挥间，樯橹灰飞烟灭！

【场景恢弘，立绘精美】
鱼和熊掌不可兼得？非也，百名武将，无需氪金，全部免费获得。坐拥貂蝉吕布，三国名将皆为我用！

【攻城掠地，乱世争霸】
还原三国战场，超多地图，数百城池等你来战！合纵连横，君临天下，成就三国霸业！

【多线培育，最强军团】
武将、装备，神兵秘宝，全都自由培养，多种养成系统助你打造最强军团！

【经典战役，独创剧情】
三国经典战役的完美刻画，搭配震撼的背景音乐，最真实的三国传奇就在这里！
